title: EBRD senior leadership visit Morocco
snippet: The EBRD’s First Vice President, Greg Guyett, and its Vice President for Banking, Matteo Patrone, are visiting Morocco from 11 to 12 December to meet senior government officials and clients from the public and private sectors.

title: EBRD Leadership Visits Morocco, Provides €50 Million Green Finance Package to Crédit du Maroc
snippet: EBRD First Vice President Greg Guyett and Vice President for Banking Matteo Patrone are conducting meetings in Casablanca from December 11-12.

title: EBRD-Backed Grid Upgrade To Drive Egypt’s Renewable Push With €200 Million Investment - SolarQuarter
snippet: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) is supporting Egypt’s move towards a greener economy by providing a €200 million financing package to the Egyptian Electricity Transmission Company (EETC).

title: EBRD Annual Meeting and Business Forum
snippet: EBRD to aim for a majority of green investments by 2025 · EBRD shareholders approve membership of Iraq · Videos: UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rishi Sunak · Chair of the Board of Governors Nadia Calviño · Acting EBRD President Jürgen Rigterink ...

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: The EBRD agreed a new green economy approach for 2021–2025 and adopted a target of becoming a majority green bank by 2025. It invested €3.2 billion in climate mitigation, climate adaptation and other activities related to environmental issues ...
